description: Ensure that input sanitization is performed and that files are validated properly before execution; furthermore, implement a strict allow list to ensure that only authorized file types are processed.(Citation: file_upload_attacks_pt2) Restrict and/or block execution of files where headers and extensions do not match.

external_references.description: YesWeRHackers. (2021, June 16). File Upload Attacks (Part 2). Retrieved August 23, 2022.
